eventDecorators.name: DomaniAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused. Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call: - if using `revokeRole`, it is the insta master - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`).

eventDecorators.name: DomaniRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused. Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call: - if using `revokeRole`, it is the insta master - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`).

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused. Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call: - if using `revokeRole`, it is the insta master - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`).

functionDecorators.name: addDomani
functionDecorators.description: PRIVILEGED FACTORY FUNCTION. Adds a newly deployed Domani tokens as an enabled Domani.

parameterDecorators.name: _domani
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the Domani contract to add.

functionDecorators.name: addFactory
functionDecorators.description: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to add a factory.

parameterDecorators.name: _factory
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the factory contract to add.

functionDecorators.name: addFee
functionDecorators.description: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to add a fee to a module.

parameterDecorators.name: _module
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the module contract to add fee to.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeType
parameterDecorators.description: Type of the fee to add in the module.

parameterDecorators.name: _newFeePercentage
parameterDecorators.description: Percentage of fee to add in the module (denominated in preciseUnits eg 1% = 1e16).

functionDecorators.name: addModule
functionDecorators.description: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to add a module.

parameterDecorators.name: _module
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the module contract to add.

functionDecorators.name: addResource
functionDecorators.description: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to add a resource.

parameterDecorators.name: _resource
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the resource contract to add.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: New ID of the resource contract.

functionDecorators.name: editFee
functionDecorators.description: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit a fee in an existing module.

parameterDecorators.name: _module
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the module contract to edit fee.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeType
parameterDecorators.description: Type of the fee to edit in the module.

parameterDecorators.name: _newFeePercentage
parameterDecorators.description: Percentage of fee to edit in the module (denominated in preciseUnits eg 1% = 1e16).

functionDecorators.name: editFeeRecipient
functionDecorators.description: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit the protocol fee recipient.

parameterDecorators.name: _newFeeRecipient
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new protocol fee recipient.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializes any predeployed factories, modules, and resources post deployment. Note: This function can only be called by the owner once to batch initialize the initial system contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _factories
parameterDecorators.description: List of factories to add.

parameterDecorators.name: _modules
parameterDecorators.description: List of modules to add.

parameterDecorators.name: _resources
parameterDecorators.description: List of resources to add.

parameterDecorators.name: _resourceIds
parameterDecorators.description: List of resource IDs associated with the resources.

functionDecorators.name: isSystemContract
functionDecorators.description: Check if a contract address is a module, Domani, resource, factory or controller.

parameterDecorators.name: _contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The contract address to check.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeDomani
functionDecorators.description: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to remove a Domani.

parameterDecorators.name: _domani
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the Domani contract to remove.

functionDecorators.name: removeFactory
functionDecorators.description: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to remove a factory.

parameterDecorators.name: _factory
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the factory contract to remove.

functionDecorators.name: removeModule
functionDecorators.description: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to remove a module.

parameterDecorators.name: _module
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the module contract to remove.

functionDecorators.name: removeResource
functionDecorators.description: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to remove a resource.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the resource contract to remove.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
